Name: girl as sweet as candy
About the game: Game Introduction In a candy city, you need to control a massage stick to massage all the girls' heads once. The same girl cannot be massaged repeatedly during this period. Clear the level when all the girls' portraits are successfully massaged! And get your own reward - 'unlock a CG video'. The game has a total of 14 beautiful cg videos. 3D screen, you can control the lens with the mouse to view the CG perspective from different angles Easy operation, can realize one-handed mode. You can switch any level to play without unlocking the level. The main purpose of the game is to relax, I wish you a happy game!
